name: Battleship Killer
description:
This game was create for the GMTK's 2019 Game Jam.

It follows the theme of "Only One" creating a game that is controled intarelly with a single button (Space Bar).

This game was created during the period of two days. It was built by only one dev (me) and sadly has no sound. It was created using Construct 2 as the engine with Aseprite for creationg 2D assets. There is no sound in this game due to time restrictions.
